name: dirtyantaeus
text: I like how his wings flutter when he jumps for the Snickers bar.

name: sugadiabeetus
text: Someone needs to make an animation of Philippe running around in the bee suit to the Invader Zim bee music. Now.

name: lizjones
text: wrapper and all

name: agika
text: Phillipe the Bumblebee does not mess around when it comes to candy bars.

name: canusdivinus
text: You delicious son of a bitch!

name: shadowlink_97
text: I have to find a way to use this in everyday conversation.

name: gigs
text: Eat a male dog.

name: i_love_kate
text: Man, that's your answer to everything.

name: carlyle
text: That is THE answer to everything.

name: panthera3000
text: Chubby for your mother 3 avatar

name: sugadiabeetus
text: How I love to lick your creamy center...

name: relaxing
text: I threw away my candy bar and I ate the wrapped / and when they told me what I did I burst out in laughter

name: aaron_haynes
text: rock on philippe

name: hollis
text: A bumble-bee!  I love the intonation evoked by the hyphen.

name: caseyb3
text:
Not a bumblebee and NOT a bumble bee but a bumble-bee

I was about to say Bumble-Bee but that would also have been Wrong

name: spinynorman
text: I would like it if he was a bumbly-bee.

name: jujubeesforjesus
text: He has to check his tongue to make sure it is all gone

name: petro
text: This fills me with a special kind of glee!

name: thatskotkid
text: I feel weird about feeling good about giving a Chubby to a reference to a song that is itself an extended Achewood reference.

name: gormster
text: It is an awesome song, though.

name: bigtom
text: that song is the reason I started reading achewood

name: never_die
text:
Roast Beef is that cool guy on your street who gave out full-sized candy.
He does this because he is from Circumstances.

name: semiquaver
text:
Guys, not everything Beef does is because he is from Circumstances.

Seriously.

name: caseyb3
text:
Man, I'm behind you on this 100%, and also Jesus Christ do I wish I had your avatar, but seriously, if you are from Circumstances - and I have been in Circumstances (blessedly brief) - Halloween is the only candy you get, and because everyone around is in Circumstances too they aren't gonna give anything good. Some are even gonna give out Literature (because anyone who really sticks to Jesus in Circumstances is a Dick) and some old ladies are gonna give out nickels and pennies and because they have not had a concept of inflation since Adlai Stevenson fixed his shoes, and then because your awful mom is on a bender you gotta stay with Gramma and she makes you write a thank-you letter to people who sent you along with Jack Chick and old stinking copper.

That is what Circumstances is like on Halloween. If you are from Circumstances come October you're just going to buy up every big-ass candy bar you can find. And chances are pretty good you're not going to know one from the other, or care too much. Life after Circumstances is generally about preventing any further Circumstances.

This is why the dude who made this strip's inevitable Circumstances comment is right. The genre of comment is a toilet seat smoking a cigar, I will give you that. But the sun shines on a dog's ass once in a while.

name: charchar
text:
We used to drive up to the good side of town and go trick-or-treating there. Until some wadsters in a giant two-story ranch gave us each one frackin' Tootsie Roll. I will one day get a decent job, move into the house next door, and do all the shitty-neighbour things I can imagine. Lawn flamingoes, loud rock, naked crying teen-age girls, the whole shebang. And I will fill their parlour with Tootsie Rolls, hiding in the wreckage, then springing out in my zombie-bride costume.

I am a girl with big plans for the future.

name: achilleselbow
text: Naked crying teenage girls = shitty? Explain.

name: charchar
text: They're just going to want to talk about their feelings and eat all the damn Snackwells.

name: canusdivinus
text:
Damn, those other things were annoying, but that's Biblical retribution.

"I curse thee to forever have thine ladies talk about their feelings, and their only action in bed shall be to eat thine Snackwells messily!

And the sucka did hella avert his eyes, for he knew that he was cold cursed."

name: tellumo
text:
best curse ever.

(although I'm still not 100% on it beating Gladdington Castle. It is crazy.)

name: tekende
text: I was about to say pretty much the same thing. You beat me to it a month ago.

name: shirt145
text: There is no such thing as a two-story ranch .

name: greenkoolayd
text: way to be a dick about architectural terms...

name: semiquaver
text: Conceded.

name: wonelove
text: seriously.

name: semiquaver
text: yeah.

name: vermy
text: Some people want to take the Good Will Hunting approach and blame everyone's problems on their upbringing. There are precious few who ponder if some of Beef's neuroses come from him being genetically predisposed to being an anal-retentive manic-depressive asshole.

name: fermatprime
text: He is none of these things, except depressive.

name: vermy
text: Some people want to take the Good Will Hunting approach and blame everyone's problems on their upbringing. There are precious few who ponder if some of Beef's neuroses come from him being genetically predisposed to being an anal-retentive manic-depressive asshole.

name: griffypoo
text: Maybe he just realized (having been a child at one point and having had experience in the matter) that fun-sized candy is not actually any fun.

name: shoinan
text: My girlfriend loved this strip until she read the continuing storyline.

name: closefriend
text: Philippe's bee costume is missing its stinger.

name: kledermans
text: Philippe would never sting anyone!

name: baryonyx
text:
It has a hugger though.

And that hugger is Philippe.

name: norsef
text: My only regret to that comment is that I have but one chubby to give.

name: boredom_man
text: It is sad that it still only has eight chubbies.

name: tekende
text: I'm pretty sure only female bees have stingers, yes? So it is appropriate.

name: ravindra108
text: You are correct sir. The males (drones) have no stinger.

name: hikikomori
text: This is a good one but I still can't shake how it looks like Phillipe has a mustache when he swallows the whole-size Snickers bar.

name: hendetta
text: Philippe conquered that whole-size Snickers bar.

name: gussiejives
text: Such an angry eater.

name: cyberia
text: greeble grabble gobble

name: darthemed
text: What's with the fancy shoes, Philippe?

name: goosey
text: They're Philippe's normal shoes . We just don't see them that often because of the way his pants cover them.

name: ibetso
text: His shoes should be saying "Here Comes a Special Bee"

name: jordstar
text: I feel like Chris made this strip to showcase his new signature that frowns the way he was feeling.

name: tinhand
text:
Dude nice catch on the frown. Yet you can still get a signed copy of this strip. Does he put an extra one on?

But did Beef get a Hershey bar by mistake? Lord help us if he gave him a Hershey bar...

name: tbtabby
text:
It's shaped like a Hershey bar, but the logo is more like the Snuckers logo.

A Herckers bar? A Snishey bar?

name: greenkoolayd
text: Snershy or Hickers

name: hypoluxa
text: So radical

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by saddestking, heccibiggs, SpinyNorman, Zem, gorrioncita, VictoriaW)

name: niraj
text: I love the intense look on his face when he jumps up

name: deusoma
text: So does he just eat it with the wrapper on? He couldn't do much in the way of manual dexterity with his hands in those wings.

name: wulvaine
text: Panel 6, man. There is some SERIOUS swallowing going on.

name: direhaggis
text: Phillipe cold attacks bad food. The 'King Piss' strip in '05 or '06 nails it.

name: jthm_guitarist
text:
Oh man a whole-size Snickers bar is an awesome treat to get on Halloween.
A Hershey bar, on the other hand, is not as good but still pretty slammin'.

name: daidai
text:
Wrappers only hold back people. Not Otters.

Never otters.

name: swatson
text: I was a bee for Halloween!

name: hellofditties
text:
Everything but panel six is adorable.

Panel six haunts my dreams.

name: andyboy
text: He shouldn't be able to fly, yet he does.

name: the_voice
text: I imagine that if Phillipe made a sound as he lunged for that candy bar, it would be something like "huaagh!"

name: dicklaurent
text: I only just noticed the angry face Chris drew below his name.

name: mikeronomicon
text: Sometimes I wish more things in life could be as cute as Philipe, but most of the time I'm thankful they are not. The phrase "So cute it made me vomit" exists for a reason methinks.

name: greenkoolayd
text: yeah, dude.  you gotta have the rough chuckles to appreciate the endearing chuckles.

name: iamadinosaur
text: He looks so excited!

name: carlyle
text: Four, five and six are what got this a perfect score.
